attributes.action: Formal apology to the Ecuadorian Government and people
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on the British Government to make a full and unconditional apology to the Government and the people of Ecuadorian for threatening to storm their embassy to arrest Julian Assange.

We also call on the Prime Minister Mr David Cameron and Mr William Hague to also formally apologise for their actions in the debacle.
